Description: Body sherd of Clazomenian black-figured pottery amphora; glaze fired red-brown; exterior: athletic scene (from left, buttock and thigh of naked athlete; cloak and arm holding possible staff of second figure) both to left.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GH.098) (phase 3)
